LayoutType: Type of layout applied to input UVs
TextureResolution: Expected resolution of the output textures; this controls spacing left between UV islands to avoid interpolation artifacts
Scale: Uniform scale applied to UVs after packing
Translation: Translation applied to UVs after packing, and after scaling
bAllowFlips: Allow the Repack layout type to flip the orientation of UV islands to save space. Note that this may cause problems for downstream operations, and therefore is disabled by default.
bEnableUDIMLayout: Enable UDIM aware layout and keep islands within their originating UDIM tiles when laying out.
